task.title: Configuring N3IWF and non-3GPP access
task.shortdesc: Use the non3gppAccessN3iwf global parameter to enable this feature. The amfUePlmnServices and amfNon3gppTai commands configure N3IWF and non-3GPP access.

step.cmd: Enable the N3IWF and non-3GPP access feature.
Enable non-3GPP access for the PLMN.
Create non-3GPP TAI for the PLMN.
Configure the preferred access for SMS over NAS delivery of MT SMS.
Configure whether the AMF reattempts the delivery of an MT SMS via the other access.
